meta_description: Discover UMMA, Ann Arbor's University of Michigan Museum of Art. A place where all are welcome to feel inspired. Feel open. Feel free.
hours_text:
1. [Visit](https://umma.umich.edu/visit/)

Toggle Playback

# Welcome  
to  UMMA

Your destination to feel free. We’re glad you’re here.

At UMMA, everyone is welcome. For free.

There’s no cost to visit and explore. Tickets are not required and admission is free. The doors are open for your spirit of discovery.

[ What’s on Display](/visit/floor-plan-galleries/) View Parking Options

Gallery Hours:  
Closed on Mondays  
Tue–Wed: 11am–5pm  
Thu–Fri: 10am–8pm  
Sat–Sun: 11am–8pm

Cafe Hours:

Mon–Fri: 8am–5pm  
Sat–Sun: 11am–5pm

Shop Hours:  
Closed on Mondays & Tuesdays  
Wed-Sun: 11am–5pm

[ See Holiday Hours ](/visit/#faqs)

collections_text:
[ Today at  UMMA ](/visit/today-at-umma/) [ Full Calendar ](/full-calendar/)

[UMMA Blog](/news-blogs/)

##  [From UMMA’s Walls to Students’ Homes: Art That Lives with You](/blog/from-ummas-walls-to-students-homes-art-that-lives-with-you/)

On January 13, a group of U-M students gathered at UMMA to find out something unexpected: which work of art would they be taking off the walls and living with for the semester.

[Exhibitions](https://umma.umich.edu/art/exhibitions/)

##  [Kaloki Nyamai](https://umma.umich.edu/exhibitions/we-write-to-you-about-africa/#currently-on-view)

Special Installation

### Now — Spring 2026

UMMA has installed Nyamai’s “Tusukane”, a large-scale mixed media work in our Gallery of African Art through Spring 2026.

[News](/news-blogs/)

##  [University of Michigan Students Decide UMMA’s Next Acquisition in Live “Art Tank” Event](/blog/university-of-michigan-students-decide-ummas-next-acquisition-in-live-art-tank-event/)

The Business of Art course helps students understand the economics of the art market by providing real word experience.

[Become a Member](/support/become-a-member/#club)

##  [The Best Kind of Match: You + UMMA](https://donate.umich.edu/zQyVW)

UMMA Club Member — Join Today!

A matching gift means your $5/month UMMA Club membership will provide $10 of support to UMMA.

[UMMA Shop](/umma-shop/)

##  [Winter Warmth, the UMMA Way!](/umma-shop/#shop-featured-items)

Knit hats, colorful scarves, and cozy animal socks—all at the UMMA Shop. M...
